revision.text: ==Translingual== ===Etymology 1=== ====Alternative forms==== * (''Roman numeral'') {{l|mul|xl}}, {{l|mul|XXXX}}, {{l|mul|xxxx}} ====Number==== {{mul-number}} # A [[Roman numeral]] representing [[forty]] ([[40]]). [[Category:Roman numerals]] =====Coordinate terms===== * Previous: [[XXXIX]] (39) * Next: [[XLI]] (41) ===Etymology 2=== ====Symbol==== {{mul-symbol}} # {{lb|mul|chiefly|clothing}} [[extra large]] {{gl|the manufactured size}} {{C|mul|Size}} ---- ==English== ===Noun=== {{en-noun|?}} {{tlb|en|no plural}} # {{lb|en|chiefly|clothing}} {{init of|en|extra large|nodot=1}} {{gl|the manufactured size or an item of that size}}. ===Adjective=== {{en-adj|-}} # {{lb|en|chiefly|clothing}} {{init of|en|extra large|nodot=1}} {{gl|of the manufactured size}}. #* '''2006''', ''Scott Pilgrim & the Infinite Sadness'', volume 3 of ''{{w|Scott Pilgrim}}'' #*: Natalie V. Adams #*: First year university #*: Temper: Nerdy #*: Hair: '''XL''' {{C|en|Size}}
